rules_text:
Strain [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell you may have all lands that produced mana to cast it not untap during your next untap step.)[/i]
When Moltenspear Warlock enters, if it was strained, it gains first strike and haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]Those who wield the eternal flame become aware of its strange properties.[/i]
